name: Zosar
description:
Controls:  Move: WASD        Attack: left mouse            Dodge-roll: space-bar

                     Start Game: '\'        Reset: '['                                   Next Floor: ']'

                     Talent Tree: 'P'       Abilities (left to right): 1, 2, 3, 4

FEEDBACK FORM (PLEASE FILL OUT): https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSdkTlf-cwkLC_IFovhoh77vc8kBaXq6GJjcU_cZ...

2D roguelike/dungeon-crawler. Egyptian-themed. You play as a pharaoh who has been killed and thrown into the depths of the underworld. You are determined to get out and exact revenge on the responsible parties. Climb through the 12 levels of the Duat, defeating gods and monsters that would keep you from your goal.

Stage of Development: Week 8 pre-beta build

Known Bugs: No pathfinding
